-   Added 'I should see ".." within X seconds' step.
-   Added 'I should see an element with id of "http://bar.com/" within 2
    seconds'.

-   Updated "press" step so it doesn't require 'When'

-   Fix bug with password field failing to be found.

-   Initial version
